findProductById.sql: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.category_id, p.stock_quantity, p.status FROM products p WHERE p.id = :productId AND p.status = 'ACTIVE'

findProductsByCategory.sql: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.category_id, p.stock_quantity, p.status FROM products p WHERE p.category_id = :categoryId AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.name LIMIT ${maxResults}
findProductsByCategory.description: Find products by category with limit

searchProducts.sql: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.category_id, p.stock_quantity, p.status FROM products p WHERE (p.name LIKE :searchTerm OR p.description LIKE :searchTerm) AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.name LIMIT ${maxResults}
searchProducts.description: Search products by name or description

updateProductStock.sql: UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = :stockQuantity, modified_date = :modifiedDate WHERE id = :productId

getProductStats.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_products, SUM(stock_quantity) as total_stock, AVG(price) as avg_price, MIN(price) as min_price, MAX(price) as max_price FROM products WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'
getProductStats.description: Get product statistics for active products

getLowStockProducts.sql: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.stock_quantity, p.reorder_level FROM products p WHERE p.stock_quantity <= p.reorder_level AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.stock_quantity ASC
getLowStockProducts.description: Find products with low stock levels
